detail_desc: Short, fitted dress in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a polo neck, long sleeves and a large cut-out section at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, wrapover, jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Cold shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves. Elastication and a small frill trim at the top, an opening with ties at the front and a lace-trimmed hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Elasticated velour scrunchies.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with elastication at the top and overlocked, scalloped edges. Extra low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a patterned viscose weave with long sleeves with ties at the ends. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Purse with a zip around three sides. Four card compartments, one note compartment and a small, zipped coin compartment. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.
Fully lined tie tanga Brazilian bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.

Trainers in chambray and imitation suede with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Calf-length skirt in a rib-knit viscose blend with a high, elasticated waist. Bell shaped at the bottom.

Short, wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined one-shoulder swimsuit with a decorative knot detail and cut-out section on the shoulder strap and a cut-out section at the waist.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves. Close-fitting ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem. Brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is recycled.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave made from a viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and gently flared skirt with seams and gathers to add width. Unlined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Hooded jacket in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Brushed inside.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Slides with faux fur at the top (sizes 7-9 also with an elastic strap around the heels) and fluted rubber soles.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Calf-length satin dress with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Long balloon sleeves with a narrow trim and covered button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.
Jersey blouse with an opening at the top with ties at the front, a seam with a drawstring under the bust, and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Cotton jersey T-shirt.
Lace bra with non-wired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener. Side support and a silicone trim.
Relaxed-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Waterproof trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop tab at the front, a grosgrain loop at the back, and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket slim-fit shorts in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Ballet pumps in imitation patent leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short chunky metal chain necklace. Adjustable length 37-44 cm.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a metal fastener at the front and covered elastication at the back.

Fitted, knee-length, sleeveless dress in a stretch weave with a round neckline. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a close-fitting skirt with decorative buttons and a slit at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a pompom trim around the armholes and a crocheted lace trim with fringing at the top.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and viscose blend with long sleeves, a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck, and a decorative lace trim at the hem.
Top in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck, short, wide sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.
A-line dress in thin, patterned sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Set in soft cotton jersey with a dress and leggings. Patterned dress with long sleeves, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt. Unlined. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in a patterned weave with a high, elasticated waist.

A-line tunic in airy, flock-print chiffon with a double-layered stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Flounces down the front that continue down the back, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Pin-tucks at the top and around the cuffs and top of the hem, and a wide flounce at the hem. V-neck inner dress in a softly draping viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps.

Set with a top in soft cotton jersey and pair of jeans in washed, stretch denim. Slim-fit jeans with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. Top with a print motif on the front, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Imitation suede boots with a fold-down shaft and an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with notch lapels, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a fleece-lined, drawstring hood and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with a pleat and button, a concealed drawstring at the waist and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Lined.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of leggings in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif, dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved, block-patterned top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a soft, cable knit with a faux fur pompom on top and a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, padded shoulders, a pleat at the back and flap front pockets. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with a gathered frill around the neckline, and press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist and a frill trim at the back.

Ankle-length dungarees in washed denim with a concealed zip down the front and a press-stud at the top and waist. Straps with a press-stud fastening, a chest pocket, patch front pockets, back pockets and wide, straight legs.
Cap in a marled weave with an appliqué at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons at the front. Inset woven section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.

Trousers woven in a cool linen blend with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, fake fly and tapered legs.

Backpack in woven fabric and imitation leather with an appliqué on the front and padded back plate. Handle and zip at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. Unlined. Size 25x35 cm.
Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt that flares gently to the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless satin top with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Bra top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a racer back and elasticated hem.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide elasticated hem. Light support.
Sandals in imitation patent leather decorated with tulle and chiffon flowers. Hook and loop tab at one side, imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a resort collar, pearly buttons down the front and a straight hem.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves and ties at one side.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short sleeves. Two elasticated seams and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a flounced hem. Unlined.
Body in ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch and one shoulder strap with a cut-out section.

Fitted, knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with a decorative lace detail at the front and inset lace panels at the top and on the sleeves. Short cap sleeves, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
